subject: class being initialized for each test
msgSnippet: One of my peers is running a JUnit test that he wrote and it appears that JUnit is initializing his test class for each test. He invokes the TestRunner in the
messageBody:
One of my peers is running a JUnit test that he wrote and it appears that
JUnit is initializing his test class for each test. He invokes the
TestRunner in the main method of the class. Is this standard or something
we're doing wrong.

I can see running the setUp method before each test, but I don't understand
why the class would be initialized before each test. Any help is obviously
greatly appreciated.

- Mike
